content: The US president has shaken up international relations and the continent is working out where it stands.

originalTitle: Kenya's border with Somalia set to re-open after almost 15 years
title: Kenya's border with Somalia set to re-open after almost 15 years
content: Somali Islamist militant group al-Shabab has staged several attacks in Kenya, prompting the border to be closed.

title: Zimbabwe shock Australia in huge upset at T20 World Cup
content: Zimbabwe bowl out a depleted Australia for 146 in 23-run win to humble one of the favourites for the 2026 T20 World Cup.

content: The White House calls it the largest deregulation in US history, but environmentalists say it will prove costly for Americans.

title: Japan says it seized Chinese vessel amid tensions with Beijing
content: The fishing boat tried to flee when ordered to stop for an inspection inside Japan's territorial waters, authorities say.
